title: Evenepoel, Van Aert, Philipsen and Belgium’s ‘luxury’ problem for road world championships
content:
'We must not be disappointed by our way of racing.' After the tactical trauma and Belgian beef of 2021, personal and national ambitions could collide again in Glasgow.

Read the full article at Evenepoel, Van Aert, Philipsen and Belgium’s ‘luxury’ problem for road world championships on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
